name: Gmail: Revisited
description:
Note: this is for the original version of Gmail. For an updated style that works with the newest version of Gmail please use style 9036

- switches interface from Arial to Tahoma
- highlights a message in the message list when hovering over it
- highlights a label in the label list when hovering over it
- highlights a folder in the folder list when hovering over it
- increases the size of the action buttons and lists
